name: tsyne
description: Elegant TypeScript wrapper for Fyne - Build beautiful cross-platform desktop UIs with Node.js

scripts.build:pkg: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cli/tsynebrowser.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output pkg/tsyne-browser-linux && cp bin/tsyne-bridge pkg/tsyne-bridge
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:bridge:all && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:headed:all: TSYNE_HEADED=1 npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration:headed && npm run test:examples:headed
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:calculator && npm run test:single-script-calculator && npm run test:browser && npm run test:widgets
scripts.test:integration:headed: npm run test:calculator:headed && npm run test:single-script-calculator:headed && npm run test:browser:headed && npm run test:widgets:headed
scripts.test:examples:headed: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 jest examples/*.test.ts
scripts.test:single-script-calculator:headed: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 jest examples/calculator.test.ts
scripts.test:browser:headed: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 node examples/web-features.test.js
scripts.test:widgets:headed: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 node examples/widget-interactions.test.js
scripts.test:screenshots: npm run build && npm run test:screenshots:all
scripts.test:screenshots:examples: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/01-hello-world.test.ts examples/02-counter.test.ts examples/03-button-spacer.test.ts examples/04-feedback-form.test.ts examples/05-live-clock.test.ts examples/07-signup-form.test.ts examples/09-players-list.test.ts examples/10-multiplication-table.test.ts examples/11-percentage-clock.test.ts examples/12-shopping-list.test.ts examples/13-tabbed-settings.test.ts examples/calculator.test.ts examples/todomvc.test.ts examples/todomvc-ngshow.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:screenshots:browser: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/browser.test.ts examples/browser-enter-key.test.ts examples/browser-home.test.ts examples/browser-page-title.test.ts examples/browser-status-bar.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:screenshots:todomvc: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/todomvc.test.ts
scripts.test:screenshots:todomvc-ngshow: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/todomvc-ngshow.test.ts
scripts.test:screenshots:calculator: npm run build && TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/calculator.test.ts
scripts.run:single-script-calculator: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/calculator.ts
